app.title: Weeks of Life
app.subtitle: A visualization based on Chilean life expectancy

lifeNumbers.title: Your life in numbers
lifeNumbers.weeksLived: You have lived {{weeks}} weeks, which is {{percent}}% of your life expectancy.
lifeNumbers.daysExperience: That's {{days}} days of experience and approximately {{seasons}} seasons observed.
lifeNumbers.heartbeats: Your heart has beaten approximately {{count}} times.
lifeNumbers.breathsSleep: You have taken around {{breaths}} breaths and slept approximately {{hours}} hours.

chilean.title: Chilean context
chilean.population: Chile currently has a population of approximately {{million}} million people.
chilean.peopleMet: The average person will meet around 80,000 people in their lifetime. You have probably already met approximately {{count}} individuals.
chilean.birthsDeaths: Since your birth, approximately {{births}} people have been born in Chile and {{deaths}} have passed away.

cosmic.title: Cosmic perspective
cosmic.earthTravel: Since your birth, Earth has traveled approximately {{km}} kilometers through space around the Sun.
cosmic.universe: The observable universe is approximately 93 billion light-years in diameter. Your life is only {{percent}}% of the age of the universe.
cosmic.solarSystem: During your lifetime, our solar system has moved approximately {{km}} kilometers through the Milky Way.

natural.title: Natural world
natural.lunarCycles: You have experienced approximately {{lunar}} lunar cycles and {{solar}} trips around the Sun.
natural.cypress: A Patagonian cypress can live over 3,600 years. Your current age is {{percent}}% of its potential lifespan.
natural.cells: During your lifetime, your body has replaced most of its cells several times. You are not made of the same atoms you were born with.
